Articles.Content:
I pull out the Magic Reset Button ^tm^ and hover my paw over it threateningly. You walk slowly out of the castle.

My castle.

I press the Magic Reset ButtonTM and we restart.

My hill.

I use a black hole to suck up the hill.

My black hole.

i use some wind or *flow* to emulate a perma counter force to the black hole

Our WIND!

**Edited <time datetime="2014-05-31T23:40:11Z" title="05/31/2014 11:40  PM" data-short="10 yr">May 31, 2014</time> by WinkAllKerb''**
  
form an apple even if 0.000001%

I put a white hole in front of the black hole to push all the wind away.

My holes! Wait...
Your space-time oddities cancel out, and the hill is returned to its default state upon that occurrence. I then claim the hill.

The entire Ori fleet bear down on your hill in their Holy Crusade. In their wake, they take over the galaxy in my name.

My galaxy.

I come to your galaxy, and I'm just so awesome that all of your peoples instantly begin to worship me as their god.

My cult.

I use my gun to shoot a knife into your head. Being the killer of their god, they beg for mercy.

I take over the galaxy.

My galaxy.

i use my fingers to dissassemble your gun and knife mols and atoms.

My Atoms.

I prevent your parents from ever meeting and construct a house on whatever's left of the hill.

My house on whatever's left of the hill.

I use the remaining magical magnets to fire jets of air at relativistic speeds, at your house.

My shattered remains of Earth.

I reassemble Earth and take it over. 

My planet.

I assimilate Earth using a complex plan involving time travel and nanites. I then use my new cyborg army to build massive orbital cities.

My solar system.

Fwoosh!

I uploaded a virus to the internets of the nanites (From a comet). You don't have antivirus protection, and it's a system32 virus that causes the nanites to crash every few seconds. The nanites eventually die in a purple goop.

My comet & purple goop cities.

I use the purple goop as repulsion gel and set up a galactic game of pinball using the comet.

My Space Cadet game.

I play pinball, and get such a high score that it causes a floating point error, destroying the machine. I then build a Dyson Sphere.

My Dyson Sphere.

Oops, the star inside was a hypergiant with its radius going past the dyson sphere's. 

My hypergiant!

I press the Reset Button.

My Hill

Your hill can't be healed from some unexpected natural disaster wich do no need to be specified choose a random one

My Random

IM A FIRIN MAH LAZOR!

My crater.

A hyperadvanced spaceship commander decides to drop tons of dirt on the crater. I spot the only hill in existence (which was created recently), and place my flag on it.

My hill.

WE ARE THE BORG. YOUR HILL WILL BE ASSIMILATED. ITS BIOLOGICAL AND TECHNOLOGICAL DISTINCTIVNESS WILL BE ADDED TO OUR OWN. 

RESITANCE IS FUTILE.

My hill.

**Edited <time datetime="2014-06-02T17:52:42Z" title="06/02/2014 05:52  PM" data-short="10 yr">June 2, 2014</time> by Vaporo**

I heal the hill but i made a critical miss due to the recursive of the heal on this hill in this thread

My critical

I build a hill on your critical.

My hill.
